description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GloriaFood Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation: from n/a through 2.4.1.

product.name: Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation
